info.name: Plussy Sticker
info.description: The Plussy is a symbol of our community. The background is transparent, so the sticker integrates perfectly in any surrounding - not just on laptops.
info.size: Big (74 x 74 mm) and small (52 x 52 mm)
info.license: The "Fellowship logo" (and variations of it) can be used to advertise the FSFE and its community in association with any Free Software related activity performed by FSFE supporters. However, if you do not have a mandate by FSFE, we ask you not to create the impression that you speak officially for FSFE, or that FSFE has certified or endorsed you to do so in any way.
info.author: Free Software Foundation Europe
